ValidationRule.description: Requires an On Hold Reason and On Hold Follow Up Date if the Counseling Status is 'On Hold'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( !$User.Bypass_Validation__c, ISPICKVAL(Counseling_Status__c, 'On Hold'), OR( ISBLANK(On_Hold_Reason__c), ISBLANK(On_Hold_Follow_Up_Date__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An On Hold Reason and On Hold Follow Up Date are required.
